definition: to entertain/to repay/to return/to reward/to compensate/to reply/to answer

sentences.english: Evidence from both studies supported adaptive performance affects the supervisory reward decision.
sentences.chinese: 適應性績效表現亦對主管獎酬決策有影響。

sentences.english: Improve rewarding system to make it inspire teachers' enthusiasm of working.
sentences.chinese: 改進獎酬方案使其更利於激發教師的工作積極性。
